item.title: UNICORN on RAINBOW A Universal Commonsense Reasoning Model on a New Multitask Benchmark
item.description: 202205231928 Cost Equivalent Curve 202205231931 Transfer Learning Approaches Directly modeling commonsense knowledge graph does not help the model, maybe this calls for something like knowledge augmented language modeling.

item.title: UniDoc Unified Pretraining Framework for Document Understanding
item.description: Hierarchical Document Textual Representation By stacking two transformers sequentially, the system models paragraph representations from tokens and then document representations on top of paragraph representations.

item.title: Video Transformer in Transformer
item.description: Problem Definition Current models view an image as patches without explicitly modeling the patch itself. In other words, transforming an image patch to a single vector through some linear layers does not capture the information to the fullest extend.

item.title: 202204280830 Bayes Error
item.description: Smallest error made possible by the inherent noise in reality, a.k.a irreducible error. References: Bayes error rate - Wikipedia .
